code: import tokenService from"./tokenService";var BASE_URL='/api/';export function create(postId){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"posts/").concat(postId,"/likes"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Authorization':'Bearer '+tokenService.getToken()}}).then(function(res){if(res.ok)return res.json();throw new Error(res.error);});}export function removeLike(likeId){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"likes/").concat(likeId),{method:'DELETE',headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer "+tokenService.getToken()}}).then(function(res){if(res.ok)return res.json();throw new Error(res.error);});}
